title: Maryland Breweries and Distilleries
text: BY WESLEY CASE | THE BALTIMORE SUN January 13, 2017 In recent years, as craft beer and spirits have grown in popularity, so has the number of Maryland microbreweries and microdistilleries. Some products produced here pull from passed-down family recipes, while others look to the state's history for inspiration. Perhaps best of all, the people behind the brands encourage visitors to come to their premises to see and taste how each product is made. Consider the list below, presented in no particular order, a place to start (and keep an eye on this space, as we'll be adding more companies over time).
